column5: Hi, my name is mark and I am a fishoholic.  I'm 29 and have been fishing for about 24 years. There is nothing I love more than the peacefulness of standing in the Notty battling a big steelhead or drifting in the boat on Nippissing for tasty walleye. I've been fishing Nippissing for 24 years and drifting the Notty for 17 years. Come fall time I'm out on the river 2-3 days a week (which I wish could be 5-6 days).  Nice Nippissing walleye   My son with his first walleye   The making of a fishoholic, my son's first trout at the trout pond   And a beauty Notty chromer   If ya see me out there, come say hi.
Mark Mc, welcome to OFC.....great introduction and beautiful pics  the little one seemed very happy about his catches    you got a fishing buddy for life  Great report and keep'em coming!! Leechman
Welcome to OFC Mark Mc great intro hope to see more reports
Welcome Mark. I'm from North Bay originally (still have family there) and have lived in Barrie for 20 odd years now.
Welcome aboard Mark.  Plenty of other freak floatfishers here too, lol.  But, ya do chase the eyes so I guess we can give ya a trial here at the site.
Sweet pics. Welcome aboard!!! Looking forward to your Nottawasaga reports. I am going to try to fish it next spring for the first time!
Welcome Mark!   Great pictures of you and your son, always fun getting the little ones on a first    Beautiful bow!
Don't think here is the right place to be to cure your addiction Mark. But glad to see you come along for the ride.
Welcome Mark, I fish the Notty as well come the fall. I'll look for you the next time out.  stan
lol yoru come to the right place for your addiction!  I fish nipissing alot in the summer as i have family up there!  sure do love that lake!  cant wait to see some of your reports!  Cheers!
Welcome Mark. Nice to see your boy enjoying the fish. My boy is 18mos And hope he will enjoy it as much as I do.
Admitting to your addiction is the first step in the right direction. Hanging out with more addicts...is always good Nobody likes a quitter
Welcome to OFC. I do believe we have met once or twice fishing the river,along with my son. Quick chat on hows the fishing and on our ways.  Enjoy your stay.
Welcome aboard and very nice intro looking forward to your many reports and pics with your son.

Thanks for the welcome guys and gals. You seem like a great bunch and I look forward to chatting with ya's.  Clamp-it = no i do not know that area of Lake Nippissing, i fish around the callander/south shore area of the lake.
I knew it, I recognize that spot were you're holding that nice walleye.
